title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-1.7 - Allowance for tips or gratuities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 141-1.7 - Allowance for tips or gratuities

State Regulations

Tips or gratuities from tenants and others shall not be
counted as part of the minimum wage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
141-1.7

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
